name: Zeitz Machz √Rhapsody
description:
No one knows what the future may hold. Just yesterday, Ais was going about her life, enjoying it to the fullest. But out of nowhere, she suddenly finds herself confined alongside a strange girl called "Alice".

To make matters worse, neither of them remembered anything prior to this incident. Just who is behind this? And why are they doing this?

A mystery yuri visual novel.

Features:

30K words

3 Endings

3 CGs

Credits:

Logo Artist: Lazy Polar Bear

Character/CG Artist: Miria Croissant and Sapphire

Editors: Callista, Kristi Jimenez and Julia Martinez

Music: Kamatamago

Background: Minchiri

Special thanks to our wonderful Kickstarter's backer!
